thread.section_title: Keep&Share Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Keep&Share | keepandshare.com | 2 of 20
thread.title: Alexandros

author: Alexandros
title: Alexandros
text: I really like your service, it is great. The reason I did not give you 5 starts is because I cannot attach other files (pdfs for example) except for pictures in a persons contact history or address. Further, I can only add in my addresses "people" with first and last names, but I cannot add a company or an institution. Also, I cannot link files, with people's records. Maybe you could add some of these features in the future. Else, your service is great
